text: Life Sahi Hai is an Indian coming of age comedy web series from the guys who gave Pyaar Ka Punchnama. It is produced by Luv Ranjan and Ankur Garg under their company named Luv Films and is created by Tarun Jain who is also the (co-writer of Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2). The first season of show consisting 5 episodes was released in June 2016 on YouTube. The second season of the show with 5 episodes was released on Zee5 in April 2018. == Plot summary == Life Sahi Hai is a sitcom that revolves around the lives of four guys who have moved to Delhi with the intention to live independently for the first time. They have a tendency to land in uncomfortable situations and what for us are hilarious all the time. While dealing with bosses, girlfriends and with each other, these guys end up in such challenging situations, which only they are capable of landing themselves in. While they are getting used to the newfound freedom, they realize that freedom isn’t free. But despite all this, they can see the lighter side of life in everything, and keep believing that ‘Life Sahi Hai’. == Cast == *Siddhant Chaturvedi as Sahil Hooda *Abhishek Saha as Siddharth Srivastava * Suhail Nayyar as Jasjit Singh * Tarun Jain as Amit Jain * Brijendra Kala as Sinha * Gunjan Malhotra as Shruti Aggarwal * Mona Ambegaonkar as Jasjit's mother * Meenakshi Sethi as Amit's mother * Karishma Sharma as The Maid * Rajesh Sharma as Maid agency owner * Saloni Batra as Neha * Poorti Arya as The Maid == Episodes == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0;" |- style="color:white" ! style="background:#222222;"| No. in Episode ! style="background:#222222;"| Title ! style="background:#222222;"| Directed by ! style="background:#222222;"| Written by ! style="background:#222222;"| Release date ! style="background:#222222;"| Production code |- |} {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width: 100%; margin- right: 0;" |- style="color:white" ! style="background:#222222;"| No. in Episode ! style="background:#222222;"| Title ! style="background:#222222;"| Directed by ! style="background:#222222;"| Written by ! style="background:#222222;"| Release date ! style="background:#222222;"| Production code |- |} == References == == External links == *Watch Life Sahi Hai on ZEE5 * Category:2016 web series debuts Category:Indian comedy web series Category:YouTube series Category:Hindi-language web series Category:ZEE5 original programming
